body:
- [x] Add unique ID to home breadcrumb

- [x] Add unique ID for the extensions button on the home page

- [ ] Add a unique ID for the console-log option (in the action dropdown)

- [ ] Add a unique ID for the show-heartbeat option (in the action dropdown)

- [ ] Add a unique ID for the preference-experiment option (in the action dropdown)

- [x] Add a unique ID for the add branch button in the new recipe page

- [x] Add a unique ID for both the true/false options in the add branch dialog in the new recipe page

- [ ] Add a unique ID for the opt-out-study (in the action dropdown) in the new recipe page

- [x] Add a unique ID to the publish button on the view recipe page

- [ ] Add a unique ID to the ok button on the view recipe page

- [x] Add a unique ID to the approve button on the approval history page

- [x] Add a unique ID to the selected action on the clone recipe page

- [x] Add a unique ID for the upload xpi button on the new extensions page

- [x] Add a unique ID for the save button on the new extensions page
body_text:
Add unique ID to home breadcrumb


 Add unique ID for the extensions button on the home page


 Add a unique ID for the console-log option (in the action dropdown)


 Add a unique ID for the show-heartbeat option (in the action dropdown)


 Add a unique ID for the preference-experiment option (in the action dropdown)


 Add a unique ID for the add branch button in the new recipe page


 Add a unique ID for both the true/false options in the add branch dialog in the new recipe page


 Add a unique ID for the opt-out-study (in the action dropdown) in the new recipe page


 Add a unique ID to the publish button on the view recipe page

 Add a unique ID to the approve button on the approval history page


 Add a unique ID to the selected action on the clone recipe page


 Add a unique ID for the upload xpi button on the new extensions page


 Add a unique ID for the save button on the new extensions page
